form.label: Data Exporter
form.description: In order to perform the export - after you are satisfied with the route_ids and planned start times chosen, use the export button at the bottom right of the table.

search.query: | tstats sum(num_trips) as count where index=route_stats by agency_name agency_id | eval desc = agency_name." (".agency_id.")" | sort -count

| tstats count where index="route_stats" agency_id=$agency_id$ by start_stop_city | rename start_stop_city as stop_city | append [| tstats count where index="route_stats" agency_id=$agency_id$ by end_stop_city | rename end_stop_city as stop_city] | stats count by stop_city
| tstats count where index="route_stats" AND agency_id=$agency_id$ AND (start_stop_city=$stop_city$ OR end_stop_city=$stop_city$) by route_short_name

| tstats count max(num_trips) as num_trips latest(route_short_name) as route_short_name latest(agency_name) as agency_name latest(route_long_name) as route_long_name dc(route_short_name) as rsn_dc dc(agency_name) as an_dc dc(route_long_name) as rln_dc where index="route_stats" AND route_short_name=$route_short_name$ AND agency_id=$agency_id$ AND (start_stop_city=$stop_city$ OR end_stop_city=$stop_city$) by route_id | eval changed = if(rsn_dc>1 or rln_dc>1 or an_dc>1, "**CHANGE** ", "") | eval description = changed.agency_name." ".route_short_name." (".route_id.") - ".route_long_name." - ".num_trips." נסיעות" | sort -num_trips

| tstats count where index=route_stats AND agency_id=$agency_id$ AND $route_id$ by all_start_time | makemv delim=";" all_start_time | stats count by all_start_time | rename all_start_time AS planned_start_time

(index=siri $planned_start_time$) agency_id=$agency_id$ $route_id$ | eval timestamp = if(timestamp=="none", xD7timestamp, timestamp) | table timestamp, agency_id, route_id, route_short_name, service_id, planned_start_date, planned_start_time, bus_id, predicted_end_date, predicted_end_time, date_recorded, time_recorded, lat, lon, data_frame_ref, stop_point_ref, vehicle_at_stop, log_version, date | rename service_id as trip_id_to_date

index=route_stats $route_id$ agency_id=$agency_id$ | table date, route_id, route_short_name, agency_id, agency_name, route_long_name, route_type, route_mkt, route_direction, route_alternative, num_trips, num_trip_starts, num_trip_ends, is_loop, is_bidirectional, start_time, end_time, max_headway, min_headway, mean_headway, peak_num_trips, peak_start_time, peak_end_time, service_distance, service_duration, service_speed, mean_trip_distance, mean_trip_duration, start_stop_id, end_stop_id, start_stop_name, end_stop_name, start_stop_city, end_stop_city, start_stop_desc, end_stop_desc, start_stop_lat, start_stop_lon, end_stop_lat, end_stop_lon, num_stops, start_zone, end_zone, num_zones, num_zones_missing, all_stop_latlon, all_stop_code, all_stop_id, all_stop_desc_city, all_start_time, all_trip_id,
